title: Latency plot in console needs axis labels, doesn't match actual latency

content.raw: While doing the latency tutorial, I was seeing a match between the target latency I typed into the box, and the ping time in the ssh window. However, the latency plot was off by about 95 ms. I suspect that this plot is showing the artificial delay generated by the router, but it is hard to tell because there are no axis labels. Ideally, this plot would show the round-trip latency, but if that's not possible, it should be labeled to indicate what it actually is measuring.
